question.text: You are driving along this road. The red van cuts in close in front of you. What should you do?

explanation.text: There are times when other drivers make incorrect or ill-judged decisions. Be tolerant and try not to retaliate or react aggressively. Always consider the safety of other road users, your passengers and yourself.

answer.text: Accelerate to get closer to the red van
Give a long blast on the horn
Drop back to leave the correct separation distance
